overview:
A innovate and determined Web Development BSc (Hons) undergraduate, currently studying at Manchester Metropolitan University, who strives to better previous accomplishments. A highly motivated and reliable individual who adapts quickly to change.

An advocate of lifelong learning thus always willing to learn. Able to work efficiently on own initiative and also capable of working effectively with peers in a group environment through clear communication and acknowledging the ideas of others in a critical manner as well as voicing own opinions. Thrives in highly pressurised and challenging working environments with set deadlines to meet clearly defined targets.
